CustomField.description: Target = 21 Days - Days from Agreement Received to OPD/PRR Complete
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( OPD_PRR_Completed__c ), TODAY()- Agreement_Received__c, OPD_PRR_Completed__c - Agreement_Received__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Target = 21 Days - Days from Agreement Received to OPD/PRR Complete
CustomField.label: Time To Plan Review KPI
